message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $105 is still a bit low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $110? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $105. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
